definition: to/for/for the benefit of/to give/to allow/to do sth (for sb)/(grammatical equivalent of 被)/(grammatical equivalent of 把)/(sentence intensifier)

sentences.english: We give them a sense of humor because laughter leaven life.
sentences.chinese: 我们要给予他们幽默感，因为笑声可以使生活更轻松。

sentences.english: Jiangsu building work accomplished thus gave high evaluation.
sentences.chinese: 对江苏建设工作，汪光焘给予了高度评价。

sentences.english: At last, the basic principle of wide-range temperature operation and automatic temperature control system are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对宽温工作的基本方法和自动控制系统给予了分析。

sentences.english: The Commission or training institution may give reward to those who are outstanding in performance.
sentences.chinese: 成绩特优者，由本会或训练机构给予奖励。

sentences.english: Begging is to request a donation in a supplicating manner.
sentences.chinese: 乞讨是以请求的方试去要求给予捐赠。

sentences.english: We are glad to see, newspaper can give community citizen reportorial chance.
sentences.chinese: 我们高兴看到，报纸能给予社区市民报道机会。

sentences.english: Benik is one of the young kids about, and it was a terrific finish.
sentences.chinese: 但是他是一个我们给予很大希望的小孩之一。

sentences.english: Every Chinese government instituted some protective policies for cattle and horses.
sentences.chinese: 历代政府对耕牛和马都给予了保护性的政策。

sentences.english: What ever the accuser said, he could give corresponding refutation.
sentences.chinese: 不论控方说什么，他都能给予相应的驳斥。

sentences.english: After surgery you will be given intravenous fluids (IV’s) in your arm.
sentences.chinese: 手术后，你将在手臂上被给予静脉输液。

sentences.english: Control group were not treated with sensory reeducation or oral intake of methycobal.
sentences.chinese: 对照组未给予感觉再训练及口服弥可保片剂治疗。

sentences.english: referring jaundiced babies for diagnosis and possible treatment;
sentences.chinese: 对有黄疸的婴儿进行诊断并给予可能的治疗。

sentences.english: The safest form is to nod and give a verbal salutation.
sentences.chinese: 最安全的方式就是点头，并给予口头称呼。

sentences.english: Recognize the importance of gie and take.
sentences.chinese: 认识到给予和获得的重要性。

sentences.english: Kumaratunga highly complimented the stance of China.
sentences.chinese: 库马拉通加夫人对中方的这一立场给予高度评价。

sentences.english: But last year, McDonald's Premium coffee got some good press.
sentences.chinese: 但去年麦当劳贴水咖啡给予很好的压力。

definition: variant of 給予|给予[ji3 yu3]
to repay a favor/to give back/feedback
to be in favor of/to support/to back/support/backing/to stand by/CL:個|个[ge4]
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

to put out/to come up with/to make (a choice, decision, proposal, response, comment etc)/to issue (a permit, statement, explanation, apology, reassurance to the public etc)/to draw (conclusion)/to deliver (speech, judgment)/to devise (explanation)/to extract
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
